amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 119-399 to ensure that the judicial review process for Section 401 of the Clean Water Act is efficient and lays out a path for certainty in resolving such actions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
